prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that controls the weather with a majestic appearance.
Imagine a legendary creature with a powerful stance and stormy colors.
Design a ground and flying type Pokemon that resembles a powerful deity.
Generate a Pokemon with vibrant orange fur and a significant presence in nature.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the elements of earth and air.
Make a unique bipedal Pokemon with a commanding aura and striking features.
Give me a Pokemon that combines strength with agility in its battle style.
